title: Ho Ho Ho Merry Kissmas
description: I.T geek Luke has admired the quirky receptionist at Castles Printing for a while. Some may say stalked. She's never taken any notice of him though.Not that it matters anyway, Jules is unavailable. She’s dating Brad; the boss’ son.But when Luke has to step in to cover for Brad in his absence, Jules sees a completely different side to her boyfriend. Or so she thinks.Attending the office party is a requirement at Castles Printing. Who said they are usually boring? Oh that’s right, that’s something that Luke and Jules would normally say.Until this one.
author: Phoebe Parkes
